fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Culture and media, Consumers, Culture, International co-operation and development, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, Youth, Justice and Fundamental Rights, External Relations, Trans-European Networks, Public Health, Food Safety, Climate Action, Borders and Security, Communication, Migration and asylum, European Neighbourhood Policy
eu_initiatives: We are registered at the Civil Society Platform of the EU Fundamental Rights Agency, and we are promoting through conferences the fundamental rights covered in the different treatis and covenants subscribe by Spain and other European countries
organisation_name: Fundacion para la Mejora de la Vida, la Cultura y la Sociedad (FundacionMEJORA)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
membership:
Asociacion Española de Fundaciones 
Plataforma Acción Social Unida 
Civil Society Plataform EU Fundamental Rights Agency 
Foundation for a Drug Free Europe
relevant_communication:
The Foundation Mejora organizes events that expose faliures of implementation of different Human Rights Covenenants european and international. 
 
It actively particiaptes in forums at the United Nations in Geneva together with ECOSOC foundations, and holds events on Human Trafficking, Slavery and Education, with the purpose of enlightening on the need of stronger plans of implementation of the existing human rights covenants and treaties.
goals__remit:
We are a national, european and international foundation, registered with number 1780 under the protectorate of the Ministry of Education, Culture and Sports, an are members of the Spanish Association of Foundations. 
Our goal is a sustainable improvement of individuals and society at large, through the promotion of Fundamental rights, Tolerance and secular methodologies for the improvement of the capabilities of the individuals and groups.
